sub_title: Cultural anthropologist | International development expert | Consultant | Interim and program management | Health Systems
summary:
Background picture: Sierra Leone-Makeni healthcare staff enthusiastic about PBF-Plus pilot 2015.

A senior team leader, project/program manager and health system strengthening expert with over 25 years of experience in the field of international development. Since August 2017 I work as independent consultant providing high quality technical services, expertise and interim management for (inter)national assignments and backstopping. Being a nurse and anthropologist from origin, the past 14 years I have specialized in health sector innovations like Result Based Financing (RBF or PBF). As one of the RBF pioneers in several African countries I'm used to work in complex, sensitive and multi-actor settings.  Over time I have developed outstanding team leadership and training and coaching skills and may rely on an international network of professionals. 

Kindly contact me at marjan.kruijzen@gmail.com to discuss on my added value and availability for your project and organisational challenges.

PLAY for your life
WEB.foundation develops games, animations, films and trainings on Sexual and Reproductive Health and Rights, SRHR. Our methodology and products are educational and stimulate conversations on sexuality and healthy behavior. Through the playful use of our materials, they learn to discuss on these sensitive issues.  WEB.foundation finds it crucial that children and adolescents have proper access to correct information and learn to communicate about sexuality, even before they become sexual active themselves. 
With our games, animations and film projects, WEB.foundation provides the instruments to enable people to contribute to their personal sexual health.
